question: How long do deliveries take?
answer: It depends on the type of delivery you have chosen: Normal is 3-5 business days, premium is 2-3 business days and next day is the day after delivery on orders before 8pm UTC.

question: What time will my delviery turn up?
answer: We have no control over the time of delivery, when you order an item you will be emailed a link by Royal Mail to track your item; this will give you updates on expected delivery times and the current status of your package.
